EXTRA_NODE.description: Extra CAN BUS-Nodes not permanent or temporary

LV_BAT_currentSensVoltage.description: The voltage returned by the current sensor of the LV battery expressed in mV

LV_BAT_summedVoltage.description: The total voltage of the LV battery pack calculated by summing each cell voltage expressed in mV

LV_BAT_voltage.description: The total read voltage of the LV battery pack expressed in mV

LV_CELL_NTC_00_resistance.description: The resistance of the NTC #0 in the battery pack expressed in Ohm

LV_CELL_NTC_01_resistance.description: The resistance of the NTC #1 in the battery pack expressed in Ohm

LV_CELL_NTC_02_resistance.description: The resistance of the NTC #2 in the battery pack expressed in Ohm

LV_CELL_NTC_03_resistance.description: The resistance of the NTC #3 in the battery pack expressed in Ohm

LV_CELL_NTC_04_resistance.description: The resistance of the NTC #4 in the battery pack expressed in Ohm

LV_CELL_NTC_05_resistance.description: The resistance of the NTC #5 in the battery pack expressed in Ohm

LV_CELL_NTC_06_resistance.description: The resistance of the NTC #6 in the battery pack expressed in Ohm

LV_CELL_NTC_07_resistance.description: The resistance of the NTC #7 in the battery pack expressed in Ohm

LV_CELL_NTC_08_resistance.description: The resistance of the NTC #8 in the battery pack expressed in Ohm

LV_CELL_NTC_09_resistance.description: The resistance of the NTC #9 in the battery pack expressed in Ohm

LV_CELL_NTC_10_resistance.description: The resistance of the NTC #10 in the battery pack expressed in Ohm

LV_CELL_NTC_11_resistance.description: The resistance of the NTC #11 in the battery pack expressed in Ohm

LV_CELL_0_isOV.description: States whether the LV cell #0 is in overvoltage

LV_CELL_0_isUV.description: States whether the LV cell #0 is in undervoltage

LV_CELL_1_isOV.description: States whether the LV cell #1 is in overvoltage

LV_CELL_1_isUV.description: States whether the LV cell #1 is in undervoltage

LV_CELL_2_isOV.description: States whether the LV cell #2 is in overvoltage

LV_CELL_2_isUV.description: States whether the LV cell #2 is in undervoltage

LV_CELL_3_isOV.description: States whether the LV cell #3 is in overvoltage

LV_CELL_3_isUV.description: States whether the LV cell #3 is in undervoltage

LV_CELL_4_isOV.description: States whether the LV cell #4 is in overvoltage

LV_CELL_4_isUV.description: States whether the LV cell #4 is in undervoltage

LV_CELL_5_isOV.description: States whether the LV cell #5 is in overvoltage

LV_CELL_5_isUV.description: States whether the LV cell #5 is in undervoltage

LV_CELL_6_isOV.description: States whether the LV cell #6 is in overvoltage

LV_CELL_6_isUV.description: States whether the LV cell #6 is in undervoltage

LV_CELL_NTC_00_isOT.description: States whether the LV cell temperature sensor #0 (NTC) detects an over temperature

LV_CELL_NTC_01_isOT.description: States whether the LV cell temperature sensor #1 (NTC) detects an over temperature

LV_CELL_NTC_02_isOT.description: States whether the LV cell temperature sensor #2 (NTC) detects an over temperature

LV_CELL_NTC_03_isOT.description: States whether the LV cell temperature sensor #3 (NTC) detects an over temperature

LV_CELL_NTC_04_isOT.description: States whether the LV cell temperature sensor #4 (NTC) detects an over temperature

LV_CELL_NTC_05_isOT.description: States whether the LV cell temperature sensor #5 (NTC) detects an over temperature

LV_CELL_NTC_06_isOT.description: States whether the LV cell temperature sensor #6 (NTC) detects an over temperature

LV_CELL_NTC_07_isOT.description: States whether the LV cell temperature sensor #7 (NTC) detects an over temperature

LV_CELL_NTC_08_isOT.description: States whether the LV cell temperature sensor #8 (NTC) detects an over temperature

LV_CELL_NTC_09_isOT.description: States whether the LV cell temperature sensor #9 (NTC) detects an over temperature

LV_CELL_NTC_10_isOT.description: States whether the LV cell temperature sensor #10 (NTC) detects an over temperature

LV_CELL_NTC_11_isOT.description: States whether the LV cell temperature sensor #11 (NTC) detects an over temperature

LV_RELAY_isClosed.description: States whether the LV relay is closed

LV_RELAY_isRelayOverrideOn.description: States whether the LV relay override is enabled

LV_CELL_0_voltage.description: The voltage of the LV cell #0 expressed in mV

LV_CELL_1_voltage.description: The voltage of the LV cell #1 expressed in mV

LV_CELL_2_voltage.description: The voltage of the LV cell #2 expressed in mV

LV_CELL_3_voltage.description: The voltage of the LV cell #3 expressed in mV

LV_CELL_4_voltage.description: The voltage of the LV cell #4 expressed in mV

LV_CELL_5_voltage.description: The voltage of the LV cell #4 expressed in mV

LV_CELL_6_voltage.description: The voltage of the LV cell #4 expressed in mV

APPS_0_voltageRangeMax.description: APPS channel #0 maximum range expressed in mV

APPS_0_voltageRangeMin.description: APPS channel #0 minimum range expressed in mV

APPS_1_voltageRangeMax.description: APPS channel #1 maximum range expressed in mV

APPS_1_voltageRangeMin.description: APPS channel #1 minimum range expressed in mV

BMS_LV_diagPWD.description: The password to enter diagnostic mode of the BMS_LV

LV_RELAY_overrideState.description: The override state to force the LV relay: no override (OFF/0), alwasy open (OPEN/1) or always closed (CLOSED/2)

TSAC_FAN_pwmDutyCycleStatus.description: PWM duty cycle percentage for TSAC fans control

DATETIME_year.description: Current year expressed as an offset from 1970

DATETIME_month.description: Current month of the year (1 = January, 12 = December)

DATETIME_day.description: Current day of the month, from 1 to 31

HVBAT_soc.description: HV Battery State Of Charge percentage

DSPACE_main_FSM_State.description: The state of the main/RTD FSM of dspace

DSPACE_amkInvFL_FSM_State.description: The state of the AMK Inverter Front Left FSM of dspace

DSPACE_amkInvFR_FSM_State.description: The state of the AMK Inverter Front Right FSM of dspace

DSPACE_amkInvRL_FSM_State.description: The state of the AMK Inverter Rear Left FSM of dspace

DSPACE_amkInvRR_FSM_State.description: The state of the AMK Inverter Rear Right FSM of dspace

BRAKE_LIGHT_activeCMD.description: The command to turn on the brake light (0 inactive - 1 active)

DASH_SDC_RLY_closeCMD.description: The command to close the SDC relay (0 open - 1 close)

RAD_FAN_pwmDutyCicleCtrl.description: PWM duty cycle percentage for Radiator Fans control

COOL_PUMPS_speedCtrl.description: Speed percentage for Cooling Pumps control

LED_1_red.description: The red channel of LED #1 of the dashboard

LED_1_green.description: The green channel of LED #1 of the dashboard

LED_1_blue.description: The blue channel of LED #1 of the dashboard

LED_2_red.description: The red channel of LED #2 of the dashboard

LED_2_green.description: The green channel of LED #2 of the dashboard

LED_2_blue.description: The blue channel of LED #2 of the dashboard

LED_3_red.description: The red channel of LED #3 of the dashboard

LED_3_green.description: The green channel of LED #3 of the dashboard

LED_3_blue.description: The blue channel of LED #3 of the dashboard

LED_4_red.description: The red channel of LED #4 of the dashboard

LED_4_green.description: The green channel of LED #4 of the dashboard

LED_4_blue.description: The blue channel of LED #4 of the dashboard

APPS_0_voltage.description: The voltage of the APPS #0 expressed in mV

APPS_1_voltage.description: The voltage of the APPS #1 expressed in mV

STEER_RME_voltage.description: The voltage of the Steering Wheel RME (rotary magnetic encoder) sensor expressed in mV

BRAKE_PRESS_FRONT_voltage.description: The voltage of the front brake pressure sensor expressed in mV

COLDPLATE_L_NTC_resistance.description: The resistance of the left coldplate NTC expressed in Ohm

COLDPLATE_R_NTC_resistance.description: The resistance of the right coldplate NTC expressed in Ohm

JACKET_FL_NTC_resistance.description: The resistance of the front left jacket NTC expressed in Ohm

JACKET_FR_NTC_resistance.description: The resistance of the front right jacket NTC expressed in Ohm

SPARE_NTC_0_resistance.description: The resistance of the spare NTC #0 expressed in Ohm

SPARE_NTC_1_resistance.description: The resistance of the spare NTC #1 expressed in Ohm

LPPS_DAMPER_FL_voltage.description: The voltage of the linear potentiometer position sensor on the front left damper expressed in mV

LPPS_DAMPER_FR_voltage.description: The voltage of the linear potentiometer position sensor on the front right damper expressed in mV

SDC_POST_BOTS_isActive.description: States whether the SDC post BOTS is active

SDC_POST_CP_PUSH_BTN_isActive.description: States whether the SDC post cockpit push button is active

SDC_POST_INERTIA_isActive.description: States whether the SDC post inertia switch is active

BRAKE_PRESS_REAR_voltage.description: The voltage of the rear brake pressure sensor expressed in mV

COOL_PRESS_LEFT_voltage.description: The voltage of the left cooling pressure sensor expressed in mV

COOL_PRESS_RIGHT_voltage.description: The voltage of the right cooling pressure sensor expressed in mV

DISCHARGE_isActive.description: States whether the discharge is discharging the DCBUS

BSPD_hasError.description: States whether the BSPD has an error

JACKET_RL_NTC_resistance.description: The resistance of the rear left jacket NTC expressed in Ohm

JACKET_RR_NTC_resistance.description: The resistance of the rear right jacket NTC expressed in Ohm

RAD_RL_IN_NTC_resistance.description: The resistance of the rear left IN radiator NTC expressed in Ohm

RAD_RL_OUT_NTC_resistance.description: The resistance of the rear left OUT radiator NTC expressed in Ohm

RAD_RR_IN_NTC_resistance.description: The resistance of the rear right IN radiator NTC expressed in Ohm

RAD_RR_OUT_NTC_resistance.description: The resistance of the rear right OUT radiator NTC expressed in Ohm

LPPS_DAMPER_RL_voltage.description: The voltage of the linear potentiometer position sensor on the rear left damper expressed in mV

LPPS_DAMPER_RR_voltage.description: The voltage of the linear potentiometer position sensor on the rear left damper expressed in mV

SDC_POST_BSPD_isClosed.description: States whether the SDC post BSPD is closed

SDC_PRE_PUSH_BTNS_isClosed.description: States whether the SDC per push buttons (hoop right/left) is closed

SDC_POST_DC_BUS_isClosed.description: States whether the SDC post DC bus (inverter mono) is closed

SDC_POST_INV_FR_isClosed.description: States whether the SDC post inverter front right is closed

SDC_TSAC_initialIn_isActive.description: Shutdown Circuit sensing: TSAC Initial input is active status

SDC_post_AMS_IMD_relay_isActive.description: Shutdown Circuit sensing: post AMS/IMD relay is active status

SDC_TSAC_finalIn_isActive.description: Shutdown Circuit sensing: TSAC Final Input is active status

SDC_PrechBypassRelay_isClosed.description: States whether the SDC precharge bypass relay is closed

SDC_TSAC_initialIn_voltage.description: Shutdown Circuit sensing: TSAC Initial Input voltage

SDC_TSAC_finalIn_voltage.description: Shutdown Circuit sensing: TSAC Final Input voltage

AIR_POS_cmd_isActive.description: Status of the Positive AIR command

AIR_POS_isClosed.description: Status of the Positive AIR mechanical state

AIR_NEG_cmd_isActive.description: Status of the Negative AIR command

AIR_NEG_isClosed.description: Status of the Negative AIR mechanical state

DCBUS_PRECH_RLY_cmd_isActive.description: Status of the DCBUS Precharge Relay command

DCBUS_PRECH_RLY_isClosed.description: Status of the DCBUS Precharge Relay mechanical state

AMS_err_isActive.description: States whether the AMS error is active

IMD_err_isActive.description: States whether the IMD error is active

TSAL_green_isActive.description: States whether the TSAL green signal is active

DCBUS_isOver60V.description: States whether the DC BUS volatge is over 60V

IMP_any_isActive.description: States whether any implausibility is active

IMP_HV_RelaysState_isActive.description: States whether an implausibility on HV relays (NEG,POS,PRECH) State is active (differene between cmd and mechanical state)

IMP_DCBUS_isActive.description: States whether the DCBUS Implausibility is active (DCBUS Less then 60V and TS is active)

AIR_POS_STG_mechStateSignal_isActive.description: States whether a Short To Gnd on AIR POS mechanical state signal is active

AIR_NEG_STG_mechStateSignal_isActive.description: States whether a Short To Gnd on AIR NEG mechanical state signal is active

TIRE_FL_sensID.description: The sensor id of the Front Left tire

TIRE_FL_statusIsSpinning.description: Acc bit of Front Left tire status register: wheel is spinning (1) or not (0)

TIRE_FL_statusIsVbattNotOk.description: Vbatt bit of Front Left tire status register: TPMS battery is below 2.2V (1) or above (0)

TIRE_FL_temperature.description: The temperature of the Front Left tire

TIRE_FL_pressure.description: The pressure of the front left tire

TIRE_FR_sensID.description: The sensor id of the front right tire

TIRE_FR_statusIsSpinning.description: Acc bit of Front Right tire status register: wheel is spinning (1) or not (0)

TIRE_FR_statusIsVbattNotOk.description: Vbatt bit of Front Right tire status register: TPMS battery is below 2.2V (1) or above (0)

TIRE_FR_temperature.description: The temperature of the Front Right tire

TIRE_FR_pressure.description: The pressure of the Front Right tire

TIRE_RL_sensID.description: The sensor id of the Rear Left tire

TIRE_RL_statusIsSpinning.description: Acc bit of Rear Left tire status register: wheel is spinning (1) or not (0)

TIRE_RL_statusIsVbattNotOk.description: Vbatt bit of Rear Left tire status register: TPMS battery is below 2.2V (1) or above (0)

TIRE_RL_temperature.description: The temperature of the Rear Left tire

TIRE_RL_pressure.description: The pressure of the front left tire

TIRE_RR_sensID.description: The sensor id of the front right tire

TIRE_RR_statusIsSpinning.description: Acc bit of Rear Right tire status register: wheel is spinning (1) or not (0)

TIRE_RR_statusIsVbattNotOk.description: Vbatt bit of Rear Right tire status register: TPMS battery is below 2.2V (1) or above (0)

TIRE_RR_temperature.description: The temperature of the Rear Right tire

TIRE_RR_pressure.description: The pressure of the Rear Right tire

IRTS_placeholderMessage.description: IRTS message placeholder TODO: update this message when you have the specification

NLG5_AHC_EXT.description: Charge balance obtained via  Ext. Ah counter connected to DI1 / DI2

NLG5_OC_BO.description: output current of the booster (if one is present and active)

NLG5_S_MC_M_CP.description: Value of mains current limit, commanded by the control pilot (SAE J1772) signal

NLG5_S_MC_M_PI.description: Value of mains current limit, commanded by the 'power indicator' (PI) analog input signal

NLG5_C_CP_V.description: special signal to tell a charging station equipped with the Control Pilot interface (SAE J1772) to switch on the facility's ventilation (in order to get rid of battery gases like hydrogen, e.g.)

NLG5_C_C_EL.description: cycle this value 0-1-0 to clear all latched charger errors

NLG5_C_C_EN.description: Must be ON to enable power stage of the charger

NLG5_C_MR.description: Enables CP-State C to request mains voltage

NLG5_MC_MAX.description: Maximum current to be drawn from the mains outlet, usually 16A. Must always contain a valid value in order to keep on charging.

NLG5_OC_COM.description: Desired battery current. Must always contain a valid value in order to keep on charging.

NLG5_OV_COM.description: Desired voltage to be output to the battery. Must always contain a valid value in order to keep on charging.

NLG5_E_B_P.description: wrong battery polarity;  error can only be cleared by cycling power ON-OFF-ON

NLG5_E_C_TO.description: CAN timeout, no control message received for >300ms

NLG5_E_NV_CRC.description: NVSRAM check sum failure; contains most of the scaling & calibration values, CAN ID's and  charging profile etc.

NLG5_E_OOV.description: battery output overvoltage; error can only be cleared by cycling power ON-OFF-ON

NLG5_E_P_OM.description: plausibility battery output voltage measurement wrong

NLG5_E_SC.description: power stage short circuit condition detected; error can only be cleared by cycling power ON-OFF-ON

NLG5_E_SDT_AH.description: Emergency Shutdown Threshold 'Amp Hours' is exceeded; see ChargeStar help section 'protective features';  error can only be cleared by cycling power ON-OFF-ON

NLG5_E_SDT_BT.description: Emergency Shutdown Threshold 'Battery Temperature' is exceeded; see ChargeStar help section 'protective features';  error can only be cleared by cycling power ON-OFF-ON

NLG5_E_SDT_BV.description: Emergency Shutdown Threshold 'Battery Voltage' is exceeded; see ChargeStar help section 'protective features';  error can only be cleared by cycling power ON-OFF-ON

NLG5_E_SDT_CT.description: Emergency Shutdown Threshold 'Charging Time' is exceeded; see ChargeStar help section 'protective features';  error can only be cleared by cycling power ON-OFF-ON

NLG5_E_T_C.description: Temperature sensor for prim capacitor defective

NLG5_E_T_POW.description: Temperature sensor for prim power stage defective

NLG5_W_C_VOR.description: Commanded value is out of specified range; max or min applicable value is assumed instead

NLG5_W_OD.description: LED Output driver defective, LEDs cannot be controlled by NLG5 anymore. Charging is still possible.

NLG5_W_PL_BV.description: Output power limited by low battery voltage

NLG5_W_PL_IT.description: Output power limited by charger internal overtemperature

NLG5_W_PL_MV.description: Output power limited by low mains voltage

NLG5_W_SC_M.description: Save-Charging-Mode reduces primary current to 3.95 A as long as one of the four internal temperature sensors indicates -18deg C or less.

NLG5_S_BPD_I.description: Bypass detection bit 1; 00: no bypass, 01: DC bypass detected, 10:AC bypass in phase, 11: AC bypass not in phase

NLG5_S_BPD_II.description: Bypass detection bit 2; 00: no bypass, 01: DC bypass detected, 10:AC bypass in phase, 11: AC bypass not in phase

NLG5_S_ERR.description: An error has been detected, red LED is ON, no power is output

NLG5_S_HE.description: Indicates if hardware enabled, i.e. a hi or lo signal is fed to the 'Power On' pin (pin3 of control connector)

NLG5_S_L_CP.description: Output power limited by control pilot signal (SAE J1772)

NLG5_S_L_MC.description: Output power limited by mains current limit

NLG5_S_L_MC_MAX.description: Output power limited by maximum mains current capability of NLG5

NLG5_S_L_MO_MAX.description: Output power limited by maximum output voltage capability of NLG5

NLG5_S_L_OC.description: Output power limited by battery output current limit

NLG5_S_L_OC_MAX.description: Output power limited by maximum output current capability of NLG5

NLG5_S_L_OV.description: Output power limited by battery output voltage limit

NLG5_S_L_PI.description: Output power limited by analog input 'power indicator' (PI) limit

NLG5_S_L_PMAX.description: Output power limited by maximum power capability of NLG5

NLG5_S_L_T_BATT.description: Output power limited by battery temperature

NLG5_S_L_T_CPRIM.description: Output power limited by temperature of primary capacitors

NLG5_S_L_T_DIO.description: Output power limited by temperature of diodes

NLG5_S_L_T_POW.description: Output power limited by temperature of power stage

NLG5_S_L_T_TR.description: Output power limited by temperature of transformer

NLG5_S_WAR.description: Warning condition on, i.e. charging power limited due to any limiting condition; red LED is blinking

NLG5_TEMP_EXT2.description: Value of external battery temperature sensor #2 (if connected and enabled)

NLG5_TMP_EXT1.description: Value of external battery temperature sensor #1 (if connected and enabled)

NLG5_TMP_EXT3.description: Value of external battery temperature sensor #3 (if connected and enabled)
